title.narrative: Voluntary Medical Male Circumcision (VMMC), Early Infant Male Circumcision (EIMC) and Pre-Service Education in Lesotho

description.narrative: The overall goal of this new project is to strengthen the Government of Lesotho's (GOL) capacity to respond to national priorities in health and HIV/AIDS and contribute to the national target of reducing the number of new HIV infections. It will achieve this through four project objectives, namely; 1) Scale-up quality of VMMC and EIMC services provided by the Ministry of Health; 2) Increase use of VMMC and EIMC services and post-procedure protective behaviors; 3) Strengthen Basotho nursing system capacity to respond to priorities in health and HIV/AIDS; and 4) Ensure long-term increases in medical male circumcision prevalence and quality education through increasingly sustainable VMMC and EIMC services and pre-service education.
